ygData.subject: Alliance helps the Maximals!...
ygData.msgSnippet: Shokaract was still outside of the base, and he was watching everyone leave. He calls Zardus. Shokaract: Hey, leader, where is everyone going? Should we be

Shokaract was still outside of the base, and he was watching everyone leave.
He calls Zardus.

Shokaract: Hey, leader, where is everyone going? Should we be going with
them?

Kracken: Ask him what our mission is.

Shokaract: Fine. What's everyone leaving to do, also?

Kracken: Ask him who we're fighting.

Shokaract doesn't ask.

Kracken: Hmm. Sometimes, it can be quite difficult to make your leaders get
annoyed...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, February 18, 2001 4:00 PM
Subject: Re: War and Peace


> ::Zardus/The Galactors::
>
> Zardus frowns, looking at the scanner reports and watching Hell
> Beast's Predacons leaving their base to head toward the CF. He
> activates his comm.
>
> "Supernova, new orders," he says into it, "Go to the following
> coordinates and attack. Its a base, but I'm sure you'll be able to
> handle it."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Supernova recieves the orders from Zardus, along with the coordinates
> of Hell Beast's new base. He sends an order to his team, and the
> Scrap/Flare jet swoops down, Supernova jumping up and combining with
> them. THe jet, now consisting of Scrap, Flare, and Supernova, turns
> around, heading for Hell Beast's base. The Vicir/Slasys jet turns
> also, following the rest of the Galactors.
>
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
> >        Black Aracnia looked to the other Predacons after they had
> landed the
> > transports containing the Ice Caves computer systems in the new HQ.
> THe
> > Predacons were gathered under the largest of the transports.
> >        "Alright, were heading out to the CF to help Hell Beast. On
> they way
> > we picked up an Allience transmission. Looks like theyre sending in
> a calvary
> > of there own." She said, armed.
> >        Tarantulas gave a brief chuckle. "And who made you leader?"
> His
> > crimsom eyes were narrowed down to menacing slits.
> >        Aracnia ignored him. "Arm yourselfs. This is going to get
> very, very
> > messy."
> >        Adrax, Aerostreak, Aquarious, Black Aracnia, Gremlin,
> Jackle,
> > Paddletail, Pheniox, Tankkor, and Tarantulas headed out, there
> destination
> > was the Cybertronian Fire and Maximal defeat was thier goal.
> >
> >
> >
> >        Ominous Prime paced the table. He had failed miserable
> agianst the
> > Maximals....and he had made enemies. He didnt care that the
> Predacons had
> > vowed for revenge, it was the fact that of all the factions he
> could be
> > defeated by, it had to be the Maximals. Revenge was definet.
> >        "I can see the CF is under heavy fire. It seems like a ripe
> > oppertunity to not only seek revenge on the Maximals, but the
> Predacons are
> > heading there as well." Putnam said, looking at the scans.
> >        Ominous nodded.  WIthin minutes the 6 Energonians were
> airborne and
> > directed towrds the Cybertronian Fire.
>
